Replace.Text: To you in a hundred years

+10%[ICON_CivicBoosted] Encouragement, completing the city will provide research progress based on 20% of the [ICON_CULTURE] culture value consumed by the city. [NewLine] After completing the city-mysticism, get the unique unit Kakata, which is equivalent to the builder , every time a technology is completed, the number of constructions will be restored for it
Equipped with the Tamimi Rehabilitation Organ, it is a reborn machine with the ability to self-evolve

Scholars from "a hundred years ago" like to call themselves predecessors, and have done a lot of research on various ancient characters and classical institutions. [NewLine] "Let's call senior and listen~"
Equipped with the Tamimi Rehabilitation Organ, it is a reborn machine with the ability to self-evolve
